channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Chronicles of the Glens
channel.desc: The Glens are entering what would normally be their busiest season, as visitors come to enjoy the unspoiled beaches and pretty villages that hug the coastline. Covid-19 restrictions have led to the cancellation of village festivals, but there are still ways to have fun, and the Glens' community is used to dealing with adversity.
